title: Grocery Shopping
body: Buy vegetables, fruits, and milk for the week.

body: Complete the quarterly performance report for submission.

body: Check in with Mom and ask how she's doing.

body: Annual dental check-up at 3 PM.

title: Code Review
body: Review PR #1256 before merging into main branch.

body: Transfer rent payment to landlord by the 5th.

title: Read a Book
body: Continue reading 'Atomic Habits' for 30 minutes.

body: Weekly sync-up with the engineering team at 10 AM.

body: Prepare healthy meals for the next three days.

body: Check renewal details and make payment before due date.
